UK's Cameron says he raised Palestinian state with NetanyahuBritish Foreign Secretary David Cameron said he told Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to "start talking about the things a Palestinian state can be rather than the things it can't be", reiterating British support for a two-state solution. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 18:04:09 GMT BGUKLT2A45J4LKKLEY7AJND3X4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uks-cameron-says-he-raised-palestinian-state-with-netanyahu-2024-02-02/Reuters世界中东
Italy's junior culture minister quits after stolen painting scandalItalian junior culture minister and art critic Vittorio Sgarbi, under investigation over possession of a stolen painting, said on Friday he was quitting because Rome's antitrust body was trying to curb his unofficial duties. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 18:01:29 GMT JXJOFOJNJBPDJPX4OLNZDYLYM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italys-junior-culture-minister-quits-after-stolen-painting-scandal-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
French minister heads to Mideast with post-war Gaza plans in mindFrance's foreign minister travels to the Middle East on Saturday to test ideas about reviving an Israeli-Palestinian political process after the Gaza war as Europe tries to play a role in a conflict that has deeply divided the European Union. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 17:57:56 GMT PAZTR3VS4VIVXIMKPQFQTK42FY https://www.reuters.com/world/french-minister-heads-mideast-with-post-war-gaza-plans-mind-2024-02-02/John Irish世界
Canada considers sanctions on settlers in West Bank over violenceCanada is looking at imposing sanctions on "extremist" settlers in the West Bank, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said on Friday, a day after U.S. action against four Israeli men accused of being involved in violence in the occupied territory. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 17:55:57 GMT RR2V2NOSZRM23DEFLBC27GLAHY https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-considers-sanctions-settlers-west-bank-over-violence-2024-02-02/Ismail Shakil, Steve Scherer世界
Romanian agreement with farmers and hauliers ends protestsRomania's coalition government said on Friday it had reached an agreement with farmers and hauliers to end weeks of protests against high business costs, even as farmers elsewhere in the EU continued to block roads and border crossings. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 17:34:24 GMT NLVBGGHHTZJNXPCWV2UHDMIQ3M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/romanian-agreement-with-farmers-hauliers-ends-protests-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
Panama's top court deals blow to Martinelli's hopes of regaining presidencyPanama's top court rejected former President Ricardo Martinelli's appeal to annul a nearly 11-year prison sentence, a court official said on Friday, casting doubt on the supermarket magnate's ability to remain a candidate in the May 5 election. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:55:59 GMT 74I4DY6JYRKWXG5MNFG2GXDNV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/panamas-top-court-rejects-ex-president-martinellis-appeal-annul-prison-sentence-2024-02-02/Elida Moreno, Valentine Hilaire世界美洲
Malta PM turns up at farmers’ protest to hear complaintsFarmers in Malta staging a demonstration on Friday against EU agricultural policies as part of Europe-wide protests were surprised when Prime Minister Robert Abela turned up in person to hear their complaints. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:53:06 GMT 2FSGBTN4FFL77FTULBAZKHVC4U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/malta-pm-turns-up-farmers-protest-hear-complaints-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
Poland extends border controls with Slovakia to stem illegal migrationPoland has extended border controls with Slovakia until March 2 to try to stop illegal migrants entering from Slovak territory, the interior ministry said on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:43:24 GMT XVHKTQRC4FMYTIXXHPONXYFWI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-extends-border-controls-with-slovakia-stem-illegal-migration-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
US imposes fresh sanctions over Iranian arms, cyber activityThe United States on Friday imposed sanctions targeting Iran's ballistic missile and drone procurement programs as well as officials it said were involved in hacking U.S. infrastructure, as Washington looks to increase pressure on Tehran. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:41:40 GMT IN75BJ7UXZKJZEMYRUCC7RHA7E https://www.reuters.com/world/us-issues-new-iran-lated-sanctions-cyber-arms-activity-2024-02-02/Arshad Mohammed, Daphne Psaledakis世界
Indian Muslim leaders urge government to end mosque-temple disputesTop Muslim leaders in India called on Prime Minister Narendra Modi's government on Friday to end disputes over mosques and Hindu temples, saying the minority Muslim population was feeling under threat and their places of worship should be protected. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 14:08:59 GMT 7AZFOHLBGBKX7IA2GYTARLFMLY https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-muslim-leaders-urge-government-end-mosque-temple-disputes-2024-02-02/Rupam Jain世界印度
Two lawyers for Russian dissident Navalny put on wanted list - state mediaRussia's interior ministry has put two lawyers for jailed opposition politician Alexei Navalny on its wanted list, state media reported on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 13:35:34 GMT YBJDLM2ISBIH7KDKMTGJOOYOXY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/lawyer- Russian-dissident-navalny-put-wanted-list-ria-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
